name: EnderDragonEntityHelper
description: Represents an Ender Dragon entity in the world. EnderDragonEntityHelper provides access to dragon-specific behaviors, phases, and body parts that are unique to the Ender Dragon boss mob.
overview: This specialized helper allows you to monitor the dragon's combat phase, access individual body parts for targeting or analysis, and track the dragon's complex multi-part structure. Instances are typically obtained from entity events, world entity queries, or by casting existing entity helpers that represent Ender Dragons.

methods.name: getPhase
methods.description: Returns the current combat phase of the Ender Dragon (e.g., 'ChargingPlayer', 'StrafePlayer', 'Landing', 'SittingFlaming').

methods.name: getBodyPart
methods.description: Retrieves a specific body part entity associated with the dragon by its internal index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The numerical index of the body part.

methods.name: getBodyParts
methods.description: Retrieves all body part entities associated with the dragon.

methods.name: getBodyParts
methods.description: Retrieves a list of body part entities matching a specific type name (e.g., 'head', 'neck', 'body', 'tail', 'wing').

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The type name of the body parts to retrieve.
